website_summaries.verdict: This pleasant gift set is a sweet and inexpensive way to give someone a wide variety of long-lasting, clean-burning, and relaxing scented votive candles.
pros: 20 hours of burn time per candle
Calming natural fragrances such as Green Zen, Coral Rose, and Vanilla Bee
cons: These are fairly small, even as votive candles go

customer_reviews.title: The candles are so Cute and smell!!
customer_reviews.text: The Candles come with a Paris postcard and eight Candles. The candles have a nice package. When I open the package, I already can smell the scent of the candles. It smell so good, it is a great item to give to someone. It come with Vanilla Bee, Spring Goddess, Lemon Verbena & Mandarin, Strawberries & Cream, Green Zen, Coral Rose, Twilight Lavender, and Crypto Menthe. All different scent, but all of them smell so good. When the candle are light it, the scent is even more attract it to it. I am not sure if I will gonna buying other kind of candle beside this one.
customer_reviews.author: Suan Liu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product came with wonderful sturdy box. The scent choices are great; unfortunately, come light them up is very disappointing... I can barely smell the scent unless I hold it close to my nose. It's probably just me in my opinion, but I like a candle that you can small even for a small bathroom. Plus the excitement of expecting it as aromatic is down the drain. I can barely smell it. I have bought cabdleo this small of a size but smells great when lit up. I see it more for just display. I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adis and Fay

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: These candles were packaged so nicely, they would make a lovely present. They are small but seem to last a while and give off a nice pleasant smell. I am pretty sensitive and a lot of candles bother me and can be to overwhelming. I find these to be perfect, they smell great without irritating my sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They're so cute and they smell AMAZING. They were my moms, but I just had to steal one. I'm not sure about how long they last because I haven't used it that long yet. I also love the box they come in.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Little to no scent
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I really like about this product is the box it came in (white, sleek, inside it had foam to insure candles did not break). Half of them didn’t have a scent before or after being lit up, and the other half didn’t smell good lit up or not. The only reason this is getting 2 stars is because of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Bovee

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my little sister. She loves the mild cents and easy to burn.
customer_reviews.author: Cydaisha D.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife she absolutely loved it beautiful box presentation and I smell good too
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: 🔥 hazard
customer_reviews.text: The color of the thin paper that covers the tops of the candles is so exact to the color of the candles, I didn’t see it !!!!!! I lit the candle ! Thank goodness I didn’t walk away. 🔥 It was so alarming that I made sure I removed the paper from the tops of the other candles This wasn’t thought out was it ? Warn some people!! Scent not that great either sorry 😐
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Morgan

customer_reviews.title: great candles
customer_reviews.text: Small and long lasting subtle scent, does not over power the room
customer_reviews.author: Julia M. Dragun

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. ZERO quality and smell 🤦‍♀️👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Enik

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my mom and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: fred hansbrough

customer_reviews.title: Product Good
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived early and I loved the scents. The price is reasonable will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Great Gifts
customer_reviews.text: Great gifts for teachers and coworkers. Most of the scents were amazing. There was only one I didn't like (can't remember the name) but just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: dnelson

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: The effect is really good,It smells very comfortable.the taste spreads quickly.It makes the whole room fragrant.I will recommend it to my friends because it makes people feel good
customer_reviews.author: Norma B

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no scent none it's a regular candle none of them has a smell very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: jerome brown

customer_reviews.title: Yinue candles smell so lovely♡
customer_reviews.text: The package was pretty..the smell of the candles was yummy. Good quality.! It's a great gift to give.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Werbiskis

customer_reviews.title: "Scented"
customer_reviews.text: These candles do not give off a scent at all!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: These candles were great gifts/prizes!
customer_reviews.text: I used these candles as prizes/gifts for game winners at a bridal shower I hosted. All the ladies loved the smells and we’re excited to try them out!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: 8 different scents, what little scent there is all have the same very subtle sickenly sweet scent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend as a birthday gift. It has a nice package which looks so luxury . So as a gift it's proper. Also the candles smell awesome. She uses it as a decoration for her room. Which i think is really a good idea. When it burns the smell wont be so strong like others bought in other supermarket . It's just a mild flower smelling which makes her really happy. I will say it's really high quality and the price is also affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set of candles
customer_reviews.text: Lovely gift set! Some scents were very strong on florals but the overall set was great! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzuka

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have bought more. Beautiful packaging. Smell fabulous
customer_reviews.author: lorraine Cobernus

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they smell great. I think they could be prettier, but they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift bags
customer_reviews.text: These candles were included in gift bags for a party we threw. They were a hit. Everyone said they loved the scent and wanted to know where I got them. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CHAz

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set of votives
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t burnt the candles yet but they are super pretty, smell lovely and would make a great gift. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quarantine Mother's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: My mother loved the gift since we live about 2.5 hrs away and haven't been able to see each other in person this was a perfect gesture along with the card that it came with. 5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: ShayMhoon

product_meta.title: YINUO LIGHT Scented Candles 2.5 Oz Glass Soy Candles Gifts for Women, 8 Pack
feature_bullets: NATURAL FRAGRANCE - Scented candles gift set with 8 pack, which includes 8 Fragrances- Strawberry, Lavender, Spring, Mint, Lemon, Vanilla, Rose and Green Zen.
100% NATURAL WAX - Made with100% pure soy wax.Providing a cleaner, longer burn.evenly burning and produce no black smoke, more healthier, harmless to human body and environment.

NATURAL INGREDIENT - Made using lead-free cotton wicks and premium, soft, highly-refined perfume-grade fragrance oils to bring you a biodegradable and eco-friendly product that will give you a clean burn and long-lasting hours of aroma.
LONG LASTING TIME - Waxy content 2.5oz per each, 15 - 20 hours burning time.

PERFECT GIFT SET - Aromatherapy candle comes with rich fragrances and beautiful package.They are appropriate for any holiday or special event,such as birthday, holiday, anniversary , Mother's Day gift or just to say thank you to anyone.
